ModMetaData.name: RimRadio: Remade
ModMetaData.author: Kyu Vulpes
ModMetaData.description:
This mod enables you to listen to any song pack you want (might have unknowns within it). It also features a way to skip to the next song, play previous songs, and play/pause. If you want to get rid of the full display, you can also switch to the mini-display. This new version of RimRadio also has settings to it.
The main reason to use it is to control how RimWorld music plays. I found it annoying that it is mostly quite and occasionally plays music.
If you are interested in helping, please visit: https://github.com/TechNGamer/RimRadio or https://gitlab.com/KuroNekoTNG/RimRadio.
Please read the LICENSE file that is either in the repo, or in this mod's file/folder.
